name: Mitch
description:
Controls

WASD or Joystick to move

Hold Space or A to interact

Self love is not a goal but a power that is fulfilled constantly, and when everything feels blue we need to remind ourselves what we are capable of, and even simple tasks like cleaning your room and getting ready for the day will warm us up, setting the right path to start discovering, expressing and enjoying ourselves. 

 In this concept game, help Mitch use her magic to complete simple tasks while making her feel motivated along the way.  

WIP
